snippet: The attack was the second time in less than a week that militants of the extremist group the Islamic State have shot down an Iraqi military helicopter.
abstract: Insurgents from Islamic State militant group shoot down an Iraqi military helicopter, killing two onboard.

byline.original: By KIRK SEMPLE and OMAR AL-JAWOSHY
byline.contributor: Employees of The New York Times contributed reporting from Tikrit and Anbar Province, Iraq.

lead_paragraph: The attack was the second time in less than a week that militants of the extremist group the Islamic State have shot down an Iraqi military helicopter.

headline.main: ISIS Militants Shoot Down Iraqi Helicopter, Killing 2
headline.print_headline: ISIS Militants Shoot Down Iraqi Helicopter, Killing 2

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
